alert.note: Alert for Houghton (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued October 17 at 3:31PM EDT until October 17 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy, wet snow is expected to result in hazardous winter driving conditions into the afternoon hours. Additional snow accumulations of 1 to 2 inches are expected. Northwest to north winds will gust as high as 40 mph at times. * WHERE...Northern Houghton County. * WHEN...Until 8 PM EDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be difficult in some areas. The hazardous conditions will likely impact the evening commute. Gusty winds and wet snow could also bring down tree branches, resulting in sporadic power outages. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Since this is the first winter storm of the season, extra caution is urged for those who must travel.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency.
